licence_overview:
If you collect or produce forest reproductive material that you intend to market or use in forest reproductive material production, you must be licensed by the [Department of Agriculture and Rural Development, Forest Service,](http://www.dardni.gov.uk/forestservice/ "Department of Agriculture and Rural Development, Forest Service"){:rel="external"} Northern Ireland.

Licences may be subject to conditions.
licence_short_description: You need a licence if you intend to use or market forest reproductive material that you have collected or produced.
overview: You need a licence if you intend to use or market forest reproductive material that you have collected or produced
title: Collect or produce forest reproductive material licence (Northern Ireland)
